Idea for a new rule: If an asteroid is fired at someone, they get one chance to destroy it before it hits them.

Idea for a new rule: If an asteroid is fired at someone, they get one chance to destroy it before it hits them.

I would suggest making a blog like I did and putting new rule or alternative ways down on it. That way this page won't get cluttered like last time.

Then you can show it to spartwo. If he likes it, he will add it.

Idea for a new rule: If an asteroid is fired at someone, they get one chance to destroy it before it hits them.

How would that work? You can only fire from a range of 250m or closer. That doesn't give a lot of time to dodge.

ScriptKitt3h, did you posted your last turn? I remember you said you took it but I can't see a persist.

If you are still doing stuffs is ok, you can take your time, and maybe solve that bug with my plane being eaten by the kraken.

I'm asking because right now i have tme and nothing to do

How would that work? You can only fire from a range of 250m or closer. That doesn't give a lot of time to dodge.

You can destroy it or dodge it. Either way you have one chance to do so.

If only robotics were stock.

why what were u attempting to do?
I was trying out IR. The doors open and close. I also have a few undisclosed projects going on.

So you were basically making opening and closing doors.

Have you tried landing legs (or was that what you were doing)?
I doubt landing gear would allow 90 degrees rotation let alone 180 shown above. I was using infernal robotics... I wouldn't recommend it, it isn't playing nice with MJ, Kerbpaint, or hyperedit.
It may not provide the desired affects but if you angle it right you can make a working door. You would just have to comprise looks for wanting of a door
